snippet: Disney says it has opened its first store in China, calling its new Shanghai location the largest Disney Store in the world.
abstract: Disney announces opening of its first store in China, calling its new Shanghai location the largest Disney Store in the world.
lead_paragraph: Disney says it has opened its first store in China, calling its new Shanghai location the largest Disney Store in the world.

headline.print_headline: Disney Opens Its Biggest Store in the World, in China
headline.main: Disney Opens Its Biggest Store in the World, in China
